content:
As an AI language model, I do not have personal experiences, but I can provide you some recommendations for things to do in Cronulla based on the tourism options available there:

1. Enjoy the Beach: Cronulla Beach is a popular destination for surfing, sunbathing, swimming, and fishing. It has a relaxed atmosphere and offers beautiful views of the ocean.

2. Coastal Walk: Cronulla has a beautiful coastal walk that takes you along the coastline and through several parks. The walk is suitable for all fitness levels and offers stunning views of the ocean.

3. Visit The Esplanade: The Esplanade is a popular street for dining, shopping, and entertainment. You can enjoy fantastic seafood, local wine, and a range of cuisines.

4. Visit The Shelly Park Beaches: There are several beautiful beaches situated in Shelly Park where you can explore, swim or sunbathe.

5. Explore the Royal National Park: The Royal National Park is located close to Cronulla and offers beautiful scenery, wildlife, and walking trails. You can also plan a picnic or camp overnight there.

6. Visit the Captain Cook Memorial: Cronulla is home to the Captain Cook Memorial, which is a popular tourist attraction. The memorial was built to commemorate Captain James Cook's time in the area.

These are just a few things to do in Cronulla, and there are many more activities you can enjoy in this beautiful coastal town.
